title: Toughbond slanted square sans
content:
Anyone know what font this is...?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828111152im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/TB-logo_5805.jpg)

 [‹ Hype - Rounded Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828111152/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43606 "Go to previous forum topic") [01011001 ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828111152/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43595 "Go to next forum topic")
author: garovski

comments.content:
[Digital Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828111152/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/digital-sans/) bold italic is close when squooshed.

- Mike Yanega

Would anybody be willing to type it out for me and email me an outlined eps of it?

garovski at hotmail.com

I will be sending you an e-mail.

- Mike Yanega
